headline: Textron Elects Rob Mionis to Board of Directors
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., February 27, 2025--Textron Inc. (NYSE: TXT) announced that Rob Mionis has been elected to the company's Board of Directors, effective March 1, 2025. Mionis is the President and Chief Executive Officer of Celestica Inc., a multinational leader in design, manufacturing, hardware platform and innovative supply chain solutions for a wide range of industries including aerospace, industrial and communications. Celestica’s solutions span design and engineering through to after-market
